verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
VERSE: 1
Hope be my anthem
Lord when the world has fallen quiet
You stand beside me
Give me a song in the night

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
CHORUS:
Jesus I need You
Every moment I need You
Hear now this grace bought heart sing out
Your praise forever

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
VERSE: 2
Beauty for ashes
You find the weak and contrite heart
Shoulder its burden
And carry it into light

verse.name: b2
verse.lines:
BRIDGE:
Remember love, remember mercy
Christ before me, Christ behind me
Your loving kindness has never failed me
Christ before me, Christ behind me
